mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.*, U.USER_POINT, O.PAYMENT_STATE, CASE WHEN P.POINT_CHANGE >= 0 THEN '적립' ELSE '사용' END AS POINT_SECTION, @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS ROWNUM FROM POINTLOG AS P JOIN USER AS U ON U.USER_CODE = P.USER_CODE JOIN ORDERS AS O ON P.ORDER_CODE = O.ORDER_CODE, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) AS R WHERE U.USER_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY P.POINT_JOINDATE ASC ) AS T ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POINTLOG ( POINT_CODE, USER_CODE, ORDER_CODE, POINT_CHANGE, POINT_JOINDATE) VALUES ( fnCode('pointlog'), #{USER_CODE}, #{ORDER_CODE}, #{POINT_CHANGE}, #{POINT_JOINDATE} )
